title: Train Sim World® 5: Manchester Airport Commuter: Manchester - Alderley Edge
description: From Piccadilly station to the modern airport terminus, multiple lines combine to serve Greater Manchester commuters aboard Northern Trains traction. Experience a variety of services with Alan Thomson Simulation’s first route in Train Sim World 5.
longDescription:
From the complex Piccadilly station to the modern airport terminus, multiple lines combine to serve Greater Manchester commuters aboard Northern Trains traction. Experience a variety of services and intricate station details with Alan Thomson Simulation’s first route in Train Sim World 5.

A railway network with complex history, the lines which service the heart of Manchester date back as far as the 1840s. The mainline through Stockport established as a major trunk route and quickly became overloaded. It was supplemented in the early 1900s with the addition of the Styal Line, an alternative path between Wilmslow and Manchester. In 1993, a spur would be built off this new line to serve Manchester Airport, taking trains directly under the flight path and right next to EGCC’s second air terminal.

In Train Sim World 5: Manchester Airport Commuter, you’ll be busy operating frequent Northern Trains services. Either driving or as a conductor, take the BR Class 323 from Alderley Edge to Manchester via Stockport, or via the triangle junction to the airport. Explore the stunningly detailed route across 2x timetables, and experience the bustling Monday to Saturday schedule, including freight, as well as the alternative Sunday patterns. 

With timetable layers, speed along the route with the Avanti West Coast Pendolino, and route hop to extend your shift across the quaint Glossop Line (other content available separately).

# Key Features
- Manchester Piccadilly to Alderley Edge via both Manchester Airport and Stockport
- Points of interest include Longsight depot and Manchester Airport landing patterns
- BR Class 323 EMU in Northern Trains livery
- BR Class 66 diesel loco in DB Cargo UK livery
- FKA Container Wagons
- Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
- True-to-life performance, suspension and handling
- Accessible Tutorial on the Training Center
- 5 engaging Scenarios and 2 authentic timetables, both with conductor mode;
- Monday - Saturday timetable
- Sunday timetable
- Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
- Additional Timetable layers adding playable passenger trains, each available separately;
- Class 390 on Avanti West Coast services 
- Class 350 on Trans-Pennine services
- Class 158, both on East Midlands and limited Northern services (in ScotRail livery)
- Class 150 and 153 Transport for Wales services
- Class 87 railtour services
- Rail Head Treatment Train services
- A selection of Route Tasks to complete
- Explore the route and trains in Free Roam
- Hop between Manchester Airport Commuter and Glossop Line (available separately) on foot
- Livery Designer, Formation Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
- Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
